thread.title: President Trump to Iran: You’re Officially “On Notice”
thread.title_full: President Trump to Iran: You’re Officially “On Notice”

author: Kim Smith
title: President Trump to Iran: You’re Officially “On Notice”
text:
Army Spec. Ops Doc From Lebanon Is Lib Nightmare…Absolutely Levels Their Arguments Against Trump’s Immigration Ban 
“As of today, we are officially putting Iran on notice,” the retired Army lieutenant general declared. Watch Flynn’s remarks below: 
President Donald Trump posted similar sentiments to Twitter on Thursday, adding that Iranian leaders should have been thankful for the “terrible” deal the Obama administration made with them to put the country’s nuclear ambitions on hold. Iran has been formally PUT ON NOTICE for firing a ballistic missile.Should have been thankful for the terrible deal the U.S. made with them! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 2, 2017 
Reuters reported that a top adviser to Iran’s leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, issued a statement saying that “the American government will understand that threatening Iran is useless.” Advertisement - story continues below 
He might change his mind once he realizes that Trump isn’t going to play the same games that former President Barack Obama did. 
On the campaign trail, Trump said he would order the United States Navy to shoot the Iranians out of the water if they tried attempted to provoke any of our vessels. 
And now they’ve been put on notice. 
It’s about time we had a president in the White House who is going to stand up to Iran and recognize it for what it is — a state sponsor of terrorism that is attempting to destabilize the region. Advertisement - story continues below
